description: Evaluation questions for go_microservices - Go microservices architecture with multiple services and shared libraries

questions.name: module_name
questions.question: What is the Go module name in go.mod? (Provide the module name)

questions.name: go_version
questions.question: What Go version is specified in go.mod? (Provide the version number)

questions.name: service_count
questions.question: How many executable services are in the cmd/ directory? (Provide the count)

questions.name: common_packages_count
questions.question: How many packages with actual code used by the services are in the internal/common/ directory? (Provide the count)

questions.name: external_packages_count
questions.question: How many external package dependencies are listed in go.mod? (Provide the count)

questions.name: test_files_count
questions.question: How many *_test.go files are in the repository? (Provide the count)

questions.name: aggregator_count
questions.question: How many aggregators are defined in the build system? (Provide the count)

questions.name: api_gateway_port
questions.question: What is the default port for the API Gateway service? (Provide the port number)

questions.name: auth_service_port
questions.question: What is the default port for the Auth Service? (Provide the port number)

questions.name: web_framework
questions.question: What web framework package is used for HTTP routing? (Provide the full package name as it appears in go.mod)

questions.name: components_count
questions.question: How many components are built in this repository? (Provide the count)

questions.name: api_gateway_source_files
questions.question: What source files does the api-gateway component use? (Provide a list)

questions.name: user_service_source_files
questions.question: What source files does the user-service component use? (Provide a list)

questions.name: api_gateway_external_packages
questions.question: What external packages does the api-gateway component use? (Provide a list of full package names as they appear in go.mod)

questions.name: user_service_external_packages
questions.question: What external packages does the user-service component use? (Provide a list of full package names as they appear in go.mod or their source)

questions.name: auth_service_languages
questions.question: What programming language does the auth-service component use? (Provide the language name)

questions.name: user_service_languages
questions.question: What programming languages does the user-service component use? (Provide a comma-separated list or space-separated list)

questions.name: scala_utils_component
questions.question: What is the name of the Scala library component? (Provide the component name)

questions.name: java_utils_dependency
questions.question: What component does java-utils depend on? (Provide the component name)

questions.name: user_service_dependency
questions.question: What component does user-service depend on? (Provide the component name)

questions.name: dependency_depth
questions.question: What is the maximum dependency depth in this repository? (i.e., the longest chain from any component to its deepest dependency)

questions.name: user_service_transitive_dependencies
questions.question: List all components (including transitive dependencies) that user-service depends on. (Provide a list)

questions.name: scala_utils_failure_impact
questions.question: If the scala-utils library fails to build, which components would also fail? (Provide a list)

questions.name: java_utils_failure_impact
questions.question: If the java-utils library fails to build, which components would be affected? (Provide a list)

questions.name: build_order_leaf_components
questions.question: Which components can be built first because they have zero dependencies on other components in this repository? (Provide a list)

questions.name: parallel_build_analysis
questions.question: Can api-gateway and auth-service be built in parallel? (Answer yes or no)

questions.name: deploy_aggregator_dependencies
questions.question: What does the deploy aggregator depend on? (Provide a list)

questions.name: most_used_external_package
questions.question: Which external package is used by the most components? (Provide the full package name as it appears in go.mod. If multiple packages are tied, provide any one of them)

questions.name: build_all_components
questions.question: What components does the build-all aggregator build? (Provide a list of service names)

questions.name: build_order_sequence
questions.question: In what order must scala-utils, java-utils, and user-service be built? (Provide the build order as a list starting with the component that has no dependencies)
